'(
wordrule
(
  (ruleid "EBL::PNEUMONIA::2019/04/16 22:06:33") 
  (example-snippet "pneumonic infiltrates") 
  (ordered true) 
  (concept ":PNEUMONIA:") 
  (words 
    ("pneumonic") 
    (":INFILTRATE:" "<EXAM-FINDING-THING>" "<DISEASE-THING>")) 
  (properties 
    (property "?0") 
    (thing "?1")) 
  (tests 
    ("notneg" ?0) 
    ("notneg" ?1)))

)
